chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, clockwork-precise, croaked, "Ten PM, Chuck! 💊" Chuck the chick 🐥, engrossed in building a pillow fort, chirped, "Later, Ferd!" Night wore on. Suddenly, Chuck felt... weird. He looked in a mirror. Tiny green spots! 😱 Ferdinand hopped in, unimpressed. "Forgot your anti-frogification medicine, eh? 🤦‍♂️ Now you're half-amphibian! Ribbit!" Chuck sighed. Pillow forts weren't worth this.
